::KitKat::
She nodded to Drillbit. "I agree it was too easy. But then, what can 
we do?  I mean, I see that this is his head or what I believe to be 
his head. I see his dead body."  She just then had a strong urdge to 
check out the old cave. "OK, Orders, let's get that cave checked 
out.  He was supposed to meet me here. Starscream, Drillbit, 
Bludgeon, head to the cave and use your scanners for any signs of 
tranformer life forms inside. Let's make this a clean sweep.  If 
there is nothing here, then we will scout for a base." She walked 
slowly to the towards the cave. "Phobia, check that body and head, 
make sure that it is the real Megatron. My nose is twitching and  I 
don't like this whole mess. It was way to easy."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He followed KitKat.
> "That couldn't have been Megatron, just to easy."
